titleStmt.title: The life and death of Sr. Thomas Moore, who was Lord Chancelor of England to King Henry the Eight
titleStmt.author: More, Cresacre, 1572-1649.
More, Thomas, 1565-1625.

notesStmt.note: By Cresacre More. Has been erroneously ascribed to his brother Thomas. Cf. DNB, v. 38, p. 448.
Place of publication from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
